passives.name: Deprotect (XIII) Extension
passives.desc:
Deprotect (XIII) use +4

When using Deprotect (XIII):
 ‚Ä¢ Grants party BRV based on own MAX BRV before BRV attack
 ‚Ä¢ Becomes group attack
 ‚Ä¢ BRV attack hit count becomes 3; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage
 ‚Ä¢ Stolen BRV may exceed MAX BRV up to 120%
 ‚Ä¢ Moderate inflicted debuff boost„ÄÅ duration +2
 ‚Ä¢ Turn rate+
 ‚Ä¢ Triggers additional HP attack on target after use

After using Deprotect (XIII):
 ‚Ä¢ BRV Attack becomes BRV Attack+ (moderate BRV damage boost; deals extra BRV damage to debuffed targets) for 8 turns
passives.short_desc: Deprotect (XIII) Extension: Boost to Deprotect (XIII)
